mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Railroad stations
Railroad travel
African American train attendants
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Railroad Employee on Train Platform II, ca. 1893.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This photograph shows an African-American Rairoad Employee posing on Railroad Platform next to a waiting train. In addition to his white uniform he is wearing a bowler-type hat. There are several other railroad employees on the platform in the background and a man in a military uniform at right center. A large building is seen on the right. Overall image faded to yellowish. Several light marks throughout photo
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: George Mason University Libraries Special Collections Research Center
